Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: People are buzzing about government spending being under the microscope after this year's federal budget announcement. A pre-pandemic review called the Public Services Approach will assess whether programs are working as they should or if more efficient and effective alternatives should be sought. With the government set to provide over $2 billion in funding for Medicare questions arise as to whether taxpayer dollars are being well-spent. It's vital to ensure every dollar is used wisely and the Public Services Approach aims to do precisely that.
